column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We've been twice and it's my fault
column2: been a few months and forgot to do a review. This time I didn't forget because one of the managers was so sweet and gracious - I believe her name was Jessica. There was confusion with the reso my husband made
column3: not sure where the blame lies
column5: Jessica took care of our party of four. Not to mention it was madhouse busy. The food was excellent
column6: starting with several appetizers. We made sure to order the seafood paella
column8: we made sure to get a pitcher of sangria at the table before it arrived. Really delicious combination! Service was attentive and courteous. Loud? You bet
column9: but it's a fun sort of loud. If Jessica is there
